summary: To save the only child of the Zhao Family, whose entire clan was massacred at the hands of a nefarious minister, a doctor sacrifices his own son; after the Zhao child grows up, the doctor becomes intent on seeking his vengeance.
cast: You Ge|Xueqi Wang|Xiaoming Huang|Bingbing Fan|Hai-Qing|Fengyi Zhang|Wenzhuo Zhao|Guoan Bao|William Wang|Wenhao Zhao|Bo Peng|Jinsong Wang|Dong-xue Li
title: Zhao shi gu er
